item.title: Call for the English language development course in view of the C1 Advanced (CAE) exam
item.description: Registration is open for the English language development course with a view to sitting the Cambridge C1 Advanced (CAE) exam. Classes, for the whole duration of 20 hours, are taking place in person in September-October at the SLAM Centre according to the calendar reported in the call.%0A%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Help us improve! Complete the survey and rate the University Library Service
Suspension of services in August 2024
item.description: Post-Graduate Guidance and Placement Services will be available until 9 August. Services will resume on 26 August.%0APhone and e-mail support services will be suspended from 12 through 23 August.%0AStudents may update their CV and apply for jobs and internships also during the suspension of services.%0A %0A
